data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Alytaus to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alytaus, Lithuania
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Alytaus.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary: On average, 13 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Alytaus, Lithuania.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Alytaus, Lithuania know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Alytaus, Lithuania.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Azerbaijani people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Alytaus, Lithuania.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Alytaus. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,122 believers find a person of peace today among the 147,778 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

location.name: Alytaus
